name: Magical Fairy Force - Champion Edition
description:
Fairy Land is in trouble! The mysterious Zevasha and her vicious cat have launched a surprise invasion, and good Queen Sugar must prepare for the defense of her empire. Fairies and other denizens from across the land answer the call to battle. Visiting humans from Earth have their own agendas, and other nefarious villains are quick to join the fray.

In this arcade-style shooter, choose from one of 16 characters and enter the battle. Fly, shoot, and defeat your opponents with a variety of special attacks. Team up with a friend for exciting four-player matches, or take on one of the tournament modes for organized fun.

Magical Fairy Force - Champion Edition expands upon the original Atari 5200 console game released in 2020, doubling the size of the cast and adding lots of new features.

Cool Stuff Includes:

  • Arcade mode packed with story dialog and illustrated endings
  • Four-player local matches for two-on-two action
  • Color edit mode, create up to eight custom palettes for each character
  • Save replays of your favorite matches
  • Eight tournament modes for organized play
